TopicTitle: Things that NASA never said at a press conference.

Articles.Content: Attendance of this conference is $1000 a head.
"What would you all do without NASA?"
Our research into making Astronauts out of Fungus is going well. We will have our own little green guys soon.
"We have proof of the existence of Intelligent Life on Planet Earth".
"We forgot to upgrade our phone plan, so we used up all our data for the month. Hopefully, the ISS will be ok on its own for a while."

1 hour ago, Kimera Industries said:

"We forgot to upgrade our phone plan, so we used up all our data for the month. Hopefully, the ISS will be ok on its own for a while."

That AWS borkage was hilarious!

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/oops-we-forgot-30m-bandwidth-charges-david-penny
To raise funds we are renting the space on the side of our rockets to advertisements.

Snobbish losers!

Look and learn.

Spoiler
We were going to start colonisation of other planets but it seems pointless without KSP2 to show us the way.
No colonization without kerbalization.
We've decided for now to use modded KSP1 until the future of KSP2 is out of the grey.
We have lost it due to the Kraken's attack.
We have decided to add four additional solid rocket boosters to SLS’s first stage and two more boosters on each solid rocket booster in order to make it go up faster.

"Ladies and Gentlemen, if you will look under your chairs. You get a Jetpack and you get a Jetpack and you get a Jetpack and..."

Edited May 20 by ColdJ
"Our special team is testing rocketjump motion for the Moon."
no, you cannot have moon water.

I blame you for the moonlit sky
And the dream that died
With the Eagle's flight
I blame you for the moonlit nights
When I wonder why
Are the seas still dry?
Don't blame this sleeping satellite

[Verse 1]
Did we fly to the Moon too soon?
Did we squander the chance?
In the rush of the race
The reason we chase is lost in romance
And still we try
To justify the waste
For a taste of man's greatest adventure, woah

[Chorus]
I blame you for the moonlit sky
And the dream that died
With the Eagle's flight
I blame you for the moonlit nights
When I wonder why
Are the seas still dry?
Don't blame this sleeping satellite

[Verse 2]
Have we lost what it takes to advance?
Have we peaked too soon?
If the world is so green
Then why does it scream under a blue moon?
We wonder why
If the Earth's sacrificed
For the price of it's greatest treasure, woah

[Chorus]
I blame you for the moonlit sky
And the dream that died
With the Eagle's flight
I blame you for the moonlit nights
When I wonder why
Are the seas still dry?
Don't blame this sleeping satellite (Satellite, satellite, satellite)

[Interlude]
(La-la-la-la, la-la-la, la-la-la, la-la)
(La-la-la-la-la)

[Verse 3]
And when we shoot for stars
What a giant step
Have we got what it takes
To carry the weight of this concept?
Or pass it by like a shot in the dark
Miss the mark with a sense of adventure, woah

[Bridge]
Woah-oh-oh-oh-oh, yeah, yeah
Woah-oh-oh-oh-oh, yeah, yeah
Don't blame this sleeping satellite

[Chorus]
I blame you for the moonlit sky
And the dream that died
With the Eagle's flight
I blame you for the moonlit nights
When I wonder why
Are the seas still dry?
Don't blame this sleeping satellite

[Outro]
Woah-oh-oh-oh-oh, yeah, yeah
Woah-oh-oh-oh-oh, yeah, yeah
Don't blame this sleeping satellite
Woah-oh-oh-oh-oh, yeah, yeah
Woah-oh-oh-oh-oh, yeah, yeah
Don't blame this sleeping satellite
Please turn off the lights on the way out.
"Today is April, 1. Were you really expecting a launch now?"
We are building a ship yard in orbit, would you prefer Star Trek, Star Wars or BattleStar Galactica style ships?
"Superman doesn't need us to fly."
Everything that we said we are developing was actually finished 40 years ago, we have just been milking it.
"The crewed spaceflights were a silly toy for the kids of mid-XX, which we still are trying to finish."
"We are starting a new global parcel service called Nasazon. Hey it worked for Jeff."
"Boeing StarLiner is currently available in Eaerly Access. At full price."
